page.title: 10Family Life
page.content: There are not many big families in the area. The usual is two or three children in each family. Quite a few of the children have grandparents living with them or near them, but most of the children have parents who moved into the area in recent times. The main reasons for moving into or out of the area are jobs and housing. The main leisure activities are going to clubs, sport, fishing and watching television. Most people have cars and move around a lot in order to enjoy facilities not available locally.
